system.description: Enhancing a power manifestation with a Psychic Surge can take a toll on a psion. After performing a @UUID[Compendium.savage-eberron.eberron-abilities.Item.0pU1D7qQI806xZVu]{Psychic Surge}, the psion must immediately make a Spirit roll. Failure means the psion is @UUID[Compendium.swade-core-rules.swade-rules.JournalEntry.swadecor03rules0.JournalEntryPage.03damageeffect00#shaken]{Shaken}. A Critical Failure means she is @UUID[Compendium.swade-core-rules.swade-rules.JournalEntry.swadecor03rules0.JournalEntryPage.03stunned0000000]{Stunned}.
